skill.name: video-downloader
skill.description: Downloads videos from YouTube and other platforms for offline viewing, editing, or archival. Handles various formats and quality options.
skill.summary: Downloads videos from YouTube and other platforms for offline viewing, editing, or archival. Handles...
skill.author: DYAI2025

security_audit.summary: This is a documentation-only skill containing only markdown documentation (107 lines). No executable code exists. All 28 static findings are false positives: URLs in docs flagged as network requests, markdown backticks flagged as shell execution, and hash strings flagged as weak crypto. The skill describes video downloading capabilities but contains no actual code.

content.user_title: Download videos from YouTube and platforms
content.value_statement: Save online videos for offline viewing and editing. Download educational content, tutorials, and your own videos with quality and format options.
actual_capabilities: Downloads videos from YouTube and other platforms
limitations: Subject to platform terms of service

use_cases.title: Save educational videos offline
use_cases.description: Download tutorials, lectures, and courses for studying without internet

use_cases.title: Archive your own content
use_cases.description: Backup videos from platforms and download your own content for editing

use_cases.title: Preserve reference material
use_cases.description: Save interviews, documentaries, and conference talks for research

prompt_templates.title: High quality
prompt_templates.prompt: Download this video in 1080p quality: https://youtube.com/watch?v=VIDEO_ID

prompt_templates.title: Audio only
prompt_templates.prompt: Download only the audio from this YouTube video as MP3: https://youtube.com/watch?v=VIDEO_ID

prompt_templates.title: Playlist
prompt_templates.prompt: Download all videos from this YouTube playlist: https://youtube.com/playlist?list=ID

output: Video: Never Gonna Give You Up

output_examples.input: Download the audio from this video as MP3

best_practices: Only download content you have permission to use
Use lower quality for faster downloads on slow connections

faq.question: Which platforms are supported?
faq.answer: YouTube is primary with support for most major video platforms including Vimeo and Dailymotion.

faq.question: What video qualities are available?
faq.answer: Supports qualities from 144p to 4K depending on source video availability.

faq.question: Can I download entire playlists?
faq.answer: Yes, paste a playlist URL to download all videos or specify a range.

faq.question: Is this legal to use?
faq.answer: Legal for personal use, education, and content you own. Respect copyright.

faq.question: What formats are supported?
faq.answer: MP4 for video, MP3 for audio, plus WebM and other formats.

faq.question: Where are videos saved?
faq.answer: Default location is Downloads folder. You can specify a different path.
